tweet: 365 Computer Security Training is dedicated to teaching the basics of securing your computer network from attackers.
Computer Information Security is the task of protecting data in storage, transit AND when it is being manipulated by software and hardware.
CIA (not the spy agency) is the fundamental principle of computer security.  It stands for Confidentiality, Availability, and Integrity.
@GenesisTechCCG Thanks Genesis, we post new articles a couple of times week.  We also have videos on YouTube  http://bit.ly/dup19h
CIA Triad of IT Security: Confidentiality ensures that only authorized persons have access to secure data.
